website_summaries.verdict: Soft, plush, and heavily favored by many parents, although the price is high.
cons: Pricey, but the extra investment will save you money in the long run

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bouncer. I particularly like that it doesn't require battery. We bought this about 3 months ago and it's holding up well. I machine wash the cover and let it dry out on our balcony. Our son is almost 5 months old and he figured out how to bounce it all by himself about a month ago. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nandin

customer_reviews.title: This is our son’s favorite! I love that he is learning to control ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our son’s favorite! I love that he is learning to control his motions since it is baby-powered. We like that we can watch him enjoy himself. The flatter setting allows us to easily bounce him to sleep in his swaddle before we move him to the crib. The fabric is easy to remove and wash, and it folds very flat when not in use. Be sure to check for open box deals here to save a lot of money!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas R. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome, Baby Bjorn does not disappoint when it comes to high quality baby items. The grey fabric is mesh-like and breathable, easy to clean. The two best features of the chair are that it reclines in 3 different positions and 1 flat position for easy storage/travel and that you can flip the grey fabric part around to convert it into a toddler chair- that makes both my kids over the moon happy!! I opted not to purchase the Baby Bjorn activity bar but bought the Tiny Love Take-Along Arch, My Nature Pals Stroll activity bar for $25 instead.
customer_reviews.author: KayS

customer_reviews.title: I'd leave a zero if I could. This is ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd leave a zero if I could. This is not an authentic product! Look at the multitude of spelling errors on this bouncers tag. I'm returning this ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to move from room to room while carrying the ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been essential for us with our second child. I use it multiple times a day throughout the house. It is easy to move from room to room while carrying the baby and simple to fold down and stow in the car. I use it any time I need a few minutes hands free. Kitchen, laundry room, dining room, bathroom. We have one upstairs and one downstairs. Initially I balked at the price but I would definitely buy it again. It washes up very easily and is well made. We also bought the toy bar - At four months our son is starting to play with it. We used this from the time he was a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Megan B Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Great build but lackluster soothing. ....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this only after I had thoroughly done my research. Unfortunately the product did not match the hype. This has unfortunately been giving the status of something almost magical for your new born, and it's not. The few features that make is great have very little to do with how it soothes your baby. My daughter is just as happy being on a 40 dollar bouncer than a 250 dollar one. And I'm ok with not having to pay an extra 200 just so that o can fold it flat.
customer_reviews.author: Noe N.

customer_reviews.title: No need to reinvent the wheel, get this bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer is the bomb! I didn’t want to get a swing and then he grows out of it and then another rocker for him to grow out of, so we went with this. We live in a small house so this was a great option for us. It easily folds away, but even if you choose to leave it out it doesn’t take up a lot of room. It’s just a great traditional bouncer that works for months! I have so many pictures of my boy in it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer! Ugly label easily removes.
customer_reviews.text: Great bouncer seat and definitely worth the money. We borrowed one from A friend for our first child and knew we needed to splurge on this for baby number two. The warning label is easily removable with a small pair of scissors or a seem splitter- just gently tug the label away and snip the thread where it attaches to the seat. No damage to seat cover if done gently.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: I love this bouncer
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old daughter loves it. I highly recommend it. It took me a little while to figure out how to adjust from position 1 to position 3 while she’s playing in it. You just have to lift the head rest up a little bit. Overall awesome product. I love feedback so please let me know if this review was Helpful or not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mathers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat. My son was born at 6 pounds 19 inches and lay well in it. He’s 3 months now and about 22 inches. He sits up and loves it. My wife and I do not like the seats that swing because it get the baby use to being swayed. Somethings we want to avoid. This is perfect in that sense. The material is breathable and super easy to wash and put back together. Yes the price is a little on the high side compared to other popular seats and brands but this I saw as an investment we will definitely get our money’s worth out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Functionality
customer_reviews.text: We have a baby who loves to be in motion. This has saved our sanity. Like many others, the price kept us from purchasing it sooner, but I am very glad we ultimately purchased this item. We were using a second hand bouncer from another brand, but there is no comparison in quality. This bounces so much easier (for her and us). I also love that it will follow her into the toddler years.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Versatile bouncer chair
customer_reviews.text: My baby is comfortable in it since he was born. Not sure how much he “plays” in it but he loves kicking his legs in general. I’ve washed the cover and it washed well. It was tight to put back on but it’s nice and smooth and supportive. I drag it around so he is sitting close by when I am doing other tasks around the house.
customer_reviews.author: New mom

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Giant warning label next to baby’s head, spelling errors on warning labels. This product did not seem authentic and will be returned. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kap

customer_reviews.title: Best baby bouncer
customer_reviews.text: Before we had are son we were looking for a go bouncer but settled on the cheaper for my wife baby shower.My son hated being in those. Unfortunately my son can't talk yet to tell me why cause him being a few months old.I went to my in laws house one day and they had this bouncer so I gave a shot and but him in it.He was calm and enjoyed being in the chair.He even fell asleep in it 👍🏽. It's pricey so we were hesitant to buy it cause of that but it's comfortable for him, cleans easily and self rocks with little effort makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t take up too much room and folds up easily.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I was skeptical to buy another baby product to put my little one in because she hates the mama roo and the rock n play. This is the only thing I can put my little one in that she enjoys and can entertain herself long enough for me to make lunch/dinner or shower. Bonus is the sleek design and neutral black color. Doesn’t take up too much room and folds up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is pricey, yes, but it is perfect. It folds up flat enough to fit under the seat in the car so it's super portable. And the whole thing can be tossed in the washing machine. Plus there aren't a ton of pieces that can break as I've found with other bouncy chairs. My daughter will sit in this and be happy as a clam. I pull it into the bathroom so she can be with me while I take a nice long shower. Life saver.
customer_reviews.author: KatyinME

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reflux babies!
customer_reviews.text: I have a severe reflux baby who chokes and projectile vomits when she’s at any angle. The acid bile is so painful for her that I spend all day and night holding her upright or having her in a carrier. Hopefully we’ll find the right medication soon but until then, thank god for this! We tried the mamaroo and every swing we could find. This is the perfect angle on the highest setting. It’s not quite straight up and down but almost. She loves bouncing and I love not holding her for a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Marlasmom

customer_reviews.title: BEST BOUNCER!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BOUNCER! Arrives in box ready to go. Very easy to adjust seat angle. Easy to get baby in and out. Nice it doesn't require batteries but provides nice gentle bounce from baby's own movements. Folds flat for storage or for transport to Grandma's house. Very good quality and construction. Light and easy to carry from one place to the other with one hand while carrying baby. The orange/rust color is even nicer looking in person than the picture. I also recommend getting the toy bar accessory for the bouncer. It's very easy to attach and detach. This bouncer is pricier than most, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this. I like the different heights, depending on if my baby is snoozing (lowest setting) or awake and needs to burp (highest setting). He really likes when we bounce him by gently pumping the seat with our foot, like an old timey sewing machine. My husband and I joked that if we got a mechanized bouncer, the baby wouldn’t have liked its speed so it’s best that this one lets us do it. It cradles him nicely and keeps his neck in a good position.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Great when baby is sick too!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to take around with baby because it’s so light. My baby has not learned to rock by herself yet because she’s too small now but actually when we got this chair she got a cold. And this is able to sit her upright while she can’t support her own neck yet. It’s not what we got this for but it ended up being good for her to stay upright while she has a runny nose on the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: ycbc27

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this bouncer - we got it when he was 6 weeks. He was a little too young to figure out how to bounce it on his own but he was content to just sit in it, too. This chair has been a life saver for me with a newborn - being able to put him down to have free hands and know he’s safe and happy is worth every penny! We had other swings and bouncers and he was NOT interested. This is still the only thing he’s satisfied in at almost 11 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not at accepted
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today Very light and practical but the quality not as I expected for that value !!! Very thin fabric I hope my unborn baby yet will love and worth the value The red warning tag is really pleased at the wrong place it looks really ugly !!! I might give it a second thought and return
customer_reviews.author: Muna badri

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but the best bouncer out there
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this due to the price but needed a place to put my 6 month old son while I'm doing things around the house. I was using a rock and play but my son absolutely hates that thing; I don't know if it's the angle or that the material is made of polyester but either way, he starts writhing in it after about a minute. Part of the reason I love this bouncer is because the material used is 100% cotton, but also the design is simple, adjusts to several different levels and is usable far longer than other bouncers.
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: Recieved a fake for sure. Beware of who you get this product from
customer_reviews.text: 1. It arrived in an opened box. 2.The warning label had spelling mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Shaine1

customer_reviews.title: Fine product/Not so fine delivery
customer_reviews.text: This item was a baby shower gift that was high on the new parents’ wish list. It arrived in the BabyBjorn box with the address label on it. The box itself was gaping open and looked terrible. The actual item wasn’t damaged but it was not presentable the way it arrived. Amazon is fine but I never would have chosen a bashed up box to give as a gift. I felt like I spent my money and that was it. Nobody cared what it came to me looking like. Do better Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cstro

customer_reviews.title: Want to love it, do love it. But wasn’t worth the price in our situation.
customer_reviews.text: Great product although the price is outrageous considering it doesn’t even do anything. Daughter hates it but she’s disabled so not the company’s fault and this is what her PT wanted her to have. I personally love the quality of the material although I find stains are hard to get out sometimes. So the only reason I gave it 4 starts was because the price is excessive and you can buy the literally same thing for $30 at target.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Midland

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't convinced, but yeah....it's worth it if you have the cash.
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence until she pooped in it and the cover popped off really easily to be machine washed. Sold! Worth it. It really does have thoughtful, superior design. Baby is perfectly happy in it, though she wasn't the first couple times (age 4 mos). I also like the portability and slim footprint compared to most baby gear. Hoping the mesh cover will be nice in the summer heat, too.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write reviews often but felt compelled to here. We LOVE this bouncer. We invested in it when when my daughter was only a few weeks old because other seats didn’t move enough (she’s wasn’t a huge fan of the Mamaroo) and she has always been the most comforted by bouncing. I like that now that she’s bigger she can move it herself by kicking. She’s almost 5 months and we’ve used it almost every day! It’s super easy to fold up and throw in the car with us for trips. It’s also easy to remove the fabric and clean. I recommend this bouncer to all of my pregnant friends!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha E Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Occupies active baby!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is bright and very active for his age. The fact that he can bounce and create his own movement not only occupies him but also allows him to make the connection that he can control his own movement. I was skeptical of the price, but anything that entertains an active baby for that long is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: MAP

customer_reviews.title: Baby is a fan
customer_reviews.text: Wow... this is amazing! I was skeptical because of the (absurdly) high price point, but decided to give it a try for baby #2 because it does not take up much space. The baby has used it for 2 months and loves it! It folds up so easily and can be brought with us anywhere. And it is super easy to clean! Machine wash and put back on. I just wish it could bounce on its own, but this thing is really awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: A really nice looking bouncer
customer_reviews.text: A really nice looking bouncer. Our little one has moments of loving and moments of wanting out. Once he can entertain himself I am sure he will be happy for longer periods. When he is not in it the cat takes over.
customer_reviews.author: Ms E.

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and easy to carry!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it so far, I expected it to be a bit bigger than what it is now, because ai have a tall girl and she is 4 months old, the bouncer is almost full when she sits; but she has fallen asleep several times in it and seems like a good tool to have when you are cooking or doing something else! I love how compact it is and how easy it is easy to carry, it will be traveling with us for sure, it will fit the big suitcase; Its very lightweight which makes it better than other items we have, because every time I almost break my back trying to kove her things!
customer_reviews.author: Inobat Tuhtamisheva

customer_reviews.title: My daughter started loving it after 2 months old
customer_reviews.text: I got this bouncer when my daughter was 1 month old. She seemed not liking it at beginning. I decided to trust the review and did not return it. She totally crushed on it when she was 2 months old. Now we put her in the bouncer when we're cooking and having dinner. She is very pleased to play with the bouncer without bothering us during dinner anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Debated need for another baby item, especially given price, but this has been so worth it! Baby loves, it’s easy to move between rooms with one hand, and we like the primarily cloth and metal construction (rather than a lot of plastic). Easy to clean and more sustainable design than many other bouncers since we could replace cloth on frame to prolong life if needed. Folds up for storage, but we will probably have out for quite awhile as it can be used as chair once baby grows.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Baby didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: I had heard that babies love these and was looking forward to some hands free mama time. But, Baby didn’t like sitting in it. Too expensive to keep around as decor so returned it. Box came ripped open. But everything inside was fine.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Love our Baby Bjorne Bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE the baby Bjorne Bouncer! I started using this when my little one was 4 weeks old! Made tasks like dishes/cooking nice to have her propped up near me! She also is very social, so we are able to chat and play very comfortably with her sitting up in this. We use it on the highest setting, but we love it! She also has had a few blowouts and the white mesh cleans so easily, always looking brand new! This is a must for babies!
customer_reviews.author: MWRIGHT1255

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever!! Mom of 2 knows whats best in bouncers
customer_reviews.text: Great bouncer forget all the mechanical battery noisy ones. This is by far best purchase ever. Its thin light and the baby learns to bounce himself it keeps them busy and happy. My 4month old loves it. I take it everywhere restaurants family trips. Ive been through 4 bouncers in 3 yrs and finally ive found the best useful one of all. The 3 levels of height is the best my son sleeps lower level and chills watching tv on 2nd level and i even feed him on the highest level. He sits up. Highly recommended. Price is high but its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great product, low weight limit
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this bouncer. It is so springy, bounces much higher and easier than any other we’ve tried. I had to return it because the weight limit is only 20 lbs according to the box. My 2 month old is 15 lbs already so I didn’t want to throw away money. Just knocked one star off for the weight limit! I guess I expected it to hold a heavier child since it’s marketed to toddlerhood in the toddler mode. 20 pounds to toddler is a huge jump.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer with breathability in warm weather
customer_reviews.text: Pros- +Ease of use +The mesh is definitely cooling and breathable as compared to canvas/fabric versions + love the ability to recline in different settings (3?) Cons - my major dislike is the mesh part that goes in between child’s legs. The mesh is really rough and seems to rub child’s (newborn) legs more than a softer fabric or canvas would. I would suggest they consider covering just this part of bouncer with another fabric or adding soft boarders as the mesh seems unnecessary on that part of bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May work better when kid can bounce themself
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, great quality. My daughter is calm in in if you are constantly bouncing her. She is still little and not able to bounce herself yet. I’m hoping she ends up like it more when she is a little bigger. Read the reviews before I bought it and spent the money when you can buy other bouncers for a lot less. Everyone swore by it so I gave it a try. Hoping to get our money worth when she is a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best baby seat we have and we have tried a lot of them. It washes great and the cover is very easy to take on and off. It folds down so flat! We have taken it on every trip. I can’t say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this thing...
customer_reviews.text: Another super fussy baby who loved being bounced on an exercise ball. I needed a place to set her down sometimes because you can't bounce 24/7 and moms have to eat too. So we bought this and lo and behold the fussy one loves it! She smiles and giggles and now that she's getting older and can bounce herself, she really seems to enjoy that aspect too.
customer_reviews.author: Spaminaytor

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without it
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer is minimalist and we cannot live without it. At first I was hesitant to spend so much but we’ve been using it every day since about the second month of baby’s life. It has been a savior for us. He naps in it and plays in it - (we purchased a “Tiny love” toy bar to attach to it). This has been our most used baby item!
customer_reviews.author: SoCha

customer_reviews.title: Great for reflux
customer_reviews.text: We call this the ‘digesting chair’ because it helps a lot with our six-week-old’s reflux problems. It’s just the right angle. Plus, it’s so easy to take the cover off in the event of a blowout. We saw one review that said it collapsed, so we keep a cushion on the floor behind it, just in case, but we’ve never had any issues if this type. It seems sturdy to me
customer_reviews.author: Mololock

customer_reviews.title: Great product! My baby's favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this. She is three months and we've been using it as soon as we felt comfortable putting her in since there are no head supports. She loves being bounced and eventually will bounce herself. It is extremely portable and we move it all over our home. If we go away on vacation, I will definitely consider bringing this along.
customer_reviews.author: SAR

customer_reviews.title: works well, solid construction
customer_reviews.text: so far, baby hasn't been a huge fan, but it's handy for having a safe place for her when we're in a different part of the house and want to keep an eye on her. Also helpful after feeding to keep her head elevated and help decrease spit up. Wish the cloth was easier to clean by wiping. It's designed well, no concerns about tipping over
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this!
customer_reviews.text: At first my 3 month old baby didn't seem to care for the bouncer and only tolerated it for 5 mins. I adjusted the incline to the sleeper position which he actually has slept in for 2 hours during a nap and now he's very happy to be in it. We help him out by lightly tapping the bouncer to give it some more bounce and he really enjoys that. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth EVERY penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest baby product EVER!!!! I wish I knew about this for my first child. It is amazing!!!!! A must have! Our son loves it! It has 3 heights so if he falls asleep I just lower it..it folds down for storage. I even take it with me if I go to friend's places for the day or go traveling. It's easy to slide off and wash. Only down side is you can't throw it in the dryer. We got rid of the baby swing we had and the other seat we had because we only needed this.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bouncer to take with us on the go. Folds flat and cleans super easy. Be careful not to adjust the angle with baby in it...we made that mistake and it folded flat and scared us all! Overall, really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DS AA

customer_reviews.title: As great as everyone else has said
customer_reviews.text: As great as everyone else has said. We just ordered a second one to use at the grandparents house for our 6 week old (we've been using it since birth). Love the adjustable recline and the shape of the snuggling but supportive seat.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Godsent
customer_reviews.text: Intially skeptical if the 150$ cost for a piece of fabric and metal, i decided to go ahead and buy it after a friend's recommendation. This product has been godsent for us. It saved us from so many sleepless night when my husband and i would run out of options to soothe the baby. If nothing works, we know putting the baby in this bouncer is going to be our least resort. We have become so dependent on this that we even took it with us on a train from NYC to Washington DC. It was so easy to fold, carry, and wash it afterwards. Best 150$ ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Ragini

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: This things has been a lifesaver. Our babe was so fussy & cry anytime we weren’t holding & walking him. This was the solution that I wish we knew about sooner. We could set him in it & rock him & he would be satisfied. Now that he’s older he’ll just enjoy sitting in it without having to be rocked. We’ve gotten so much hands free time because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer for newborn!
customer_reviews.text: We got the bjorn bouncer and the mamaroo rocker for our first son and we love both for different purposes. The bjorn bouncer has been great to move around the house. I often bring it the bathroom with me while I’m getting ready in the morning. It’s also really great to travel with. We recently just brought on a trip to Colorado. It easily collapses down flat for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best baby purchases yet! It is so worth the price. I just wished I would have bought one for our three older kids when they were babies but alas we got it for our last child.... who happens to be our only son lol. I just had to get it! He is now old enough to bounce it and it is the cutest thing. He loves it! It is also so easy to clean and folds so thin that we just put it behind his bassinet in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Ramirez Family Buys

customer_reviews.title: We got this when our baby was only about a ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this when our baby was only about a month old. He obviously wasn't ready for it yet since he didn't have any neck control at the time. Fast forward to today (currently 4 months old), baby hates being laid down on his back and loves to sit in this bouncer. We put him in the bouncer when we eat, take a shower, do laundry etx. Truly a lifesaver to get things done!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best!! you know your baby is safe you can buckle her in there and do what you need to do and she’s not going anywhere and she’s comfortable and everybody’s happy. I bought so many and I didn’t want to buy this one because of the price. But I wish I would’ve saved all the money from before and just bought this to begin with. Believe it or not it’s worth the money. Save yourself the sanity and just get this one.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Bouncers
customer_reviews.text: We own multiple of these bouncers and recommend them to just about everyone. It folds up easily which makes it great for storing, travel, and more. It does take two hands to fold up or adjust but is a very quick maneuver. Our kids have loved napping and bouncing in these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best baby item we have purchased!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this chair I was a little disappointed as it seemed to be a very expensive piece of fabric. However, we quickly changed our tune when we realized she could be in it by herself and be quiet for the first time!! It is a total game changer and worth every penny. Highly Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Jack

customer_reviews.title: Baby Said, No Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Our little one did NOT like this at all. We didn't like how this leaned back so much, only had a few adjustment options, and we were always nervous that it would snap and break at any time. For such an expensive item, you'd think it was life-changing. Alas, it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect safe place for baby to hang out
customer_reviews.text: When the previous "baby holder" I had as recalled I got this as a replacement. Baby girl didn't like it initially, but once she was 7-8 weeks old, she loves it. Great to have a safe place to put her down while I shower, fix food, etc., and still keep an eye on her. It is easy to move room to room and folds flat. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: I gave it the second star because the quality of the product is good.
customer_reviews.text: False advertisement, it has a very big warning label in front of it. I though it was a manufacturing defect, I returned it (I wanted to give them a second chance), and they replaced it with another one with the same problem, the big warning label right where the baby's head goes. I gave it the second star because the quality of the product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Worthy splurge!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting this for sometime and finally got it! Love the quality. Worth the money. So sturdy and modern. Not too cheesy and will be perfect for a boy or girl. *Definitely will follow all safety regulations- but removed the warning label that was on the front of the bouncer easily.
customer_reviews.author: MomLifeGreatWife

customer_reviews.title: Baby grew to love it.
customer_reviews.text: My baby did not like this at first and I was bummed since it’s pricey compared to others. A month later he was tolerating it more and now at 5 months he has been using it for months and likes it and it allows us to eat dinner while he is bouncing away. Really glad I spent the extra money and went with this one. Plus it looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Blocker

customer_reviews.title: Parents and baby like this bouncer
customer_reviews.text: Parents and baby like this bouncer. Today the cover got fully dirty for the first time due to a diaper blow out. Came off the frame fine and cleaned right up. Baby and parents like the support and fit. I will say the clasps are a little awkward, but can still be managed with a single hand.
customer_reviews.author: F. Pepin

customer_reviews.title: bouncy flouncy pouncy trouncy fun fun fun fun fun 🎶
customer_reviews.text: Babysaurus loves this bouncer. He's a hot baby so the mesh is nice for cooling/ventilation; when it's time for a nap or it's a bit cooler weather, I lay a soft blankie in it, drop it to the 2nd notch and he happily snoozes. He can do it all in this thing - he plays, does his crazy leg workout, drinks bottles, naps and examines his feet comfortably. I believe it has also helped round out the back of his head a bit, eliminating that baby-flat-head issue that noobs tend to have. My only teensy complaint is that the buttons on the harness are kind of hard to deal with when you have a squirmer... but meh, he's happy!
customer_reviews.author: mascarasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Baby didn’t care for the bouncer
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my son was 4 months old hoping he could entertain himself while I attend to other things. Too bad my son didn’t care for it. All he wanted to do was roll and hated to be strapped in a chair. I couldn’t leave him in the bouncer for even 5 mins, which completely defeats the purpose. Maybe he would have liked it better if I had gotten the toy bar. The bouncer is well made but it is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: The best baby product
customer_reviews.text: This should be on everyone's new baby wish list. It's the best, by far. My son had a fabulous time kicking away in here, and being propped up more than a regular swing let him see what was going on more. I paired it with a clip-on toy bar so he had things to play with. Absolutely love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype and over priced
customer_reviews.text: Everyone told me this was a must have baby product but so far my baby doesn’t like being in the seat. The product is well made and does have 2 nice inclines but for the price, save your money and get something else. I’d like to think that my baby will grow to love the product but it’s too much money for such a simple seat.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best bouncer for baby ever made
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best bouncer for baby ever made! Our baby loves bouncing in it, and it allows me to get things done. I love the mash fabric, it creates a very comfortable hammock and it is ventilated and washes well. Easy to move around and easy to travel with. love that it has a few positions.
customer_reviews.author: adir  b

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer
customer_reviews.text: Great little seat and easy to move around. Baby (3 months) isn’t sure about it yet. But as she gets older I think she’ll enjoy it more. Will probably get the activity bar to help her enjoy it more. Also - This product has the warning label on the front even though it is not present in the photos. I contacted the company to make sure the one I received was not fake. The label is there to meet US standards.
customer_reviews.author: TLG

customer_reviews.title: Black material not great.
customer_reviews.text: I got two such bouncers for my twins. The other one is in beige/grey jersey cotton which is really good, i'd give 5 stars. The only reason I am giving one less star for this one is because the black material attracts a lot of lint and also it seems very faded and washed out after a few washes. Just the color. Otherwise its a great product. Just get it n a different color or material.
customer_reviews.author: Afreen Khan

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband prefered an electrical swing (which we bought too) - We use both. I love the babybjorn bouncer - so easy to travel with it or move around. Great quality - pricy but baby will use it longer than the swing. When baby is too small to move it, you can bounce it with your feet (which I love to do). After about 6 weeks, baby can move it herself.
customer_reviews.author: B&G K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, color is darker in person
customer_reviews.text: Bouncer is very easy to use and I'm hoping the new baby will like it. Bought it to travel and it folds flat as advertised. 4 stars because the photo is misleading. The grey is so dark it's nearly black. Wish it was more silver grey in color like the photo shows.
customer_reviews.author: LancerOT

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My three month old loves this! Especially after he eats, because he gets alone time to digest without mom and dad smothering him for a few minutes! 😂 then back to the cuddles and kisses! He also really loves the wooden toy that you can get for this! He’s mesmerized!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer
customer_reviews.text: I don’t believe this to be an authentic product. The labels have numerous misspellings and my bouncer arrived with a warning label on the front of the fabric which none of the authentic ones have. Will be returning my bouncer and buying one in a store instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love this item easy to move around. I feel confident in my child’s safety and it folds down super thin. When we first brought him home I was concerned about laying him in a rocker for fear he would get too scrunched up and not be able to breathe. In the bouncer he is more upright. It’s also perfect for my bath time and going outside.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Baby Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. We had numerous friends who were enamored by this product and I thought NO WAY can it be that good. And then we bought one and found it - IT'S THAT GOOD! Our baby loved this seat which we have used for entertaining her (with clip on toy), feeding, napping, sunset watching on the beach, and a way to give medicine when you don't have an extra set of hands around. Super easy to remove and throw in the wash for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: My new born loves it! I first got a mamaroo but my daughter seems not into it. I then got this bouncer. My daughter seems enjoy her selves while in the bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: linnn

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing so much and so does my baby ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing so much and so does my baby girl! I love how easy it is. There's no assembly required and its super easy to adjust (one handed even!!!). I also like that there are no frills, bells or whistles which can sometimes be TOO stimulating for a baby's wake time. Would say this is a must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it
customer_reviews.text: Great thing to have around! The baby enjoys being able to see what's going on - despite not sitting up yet. Baby is now 10 weeks old- and she reaches out and swats at the wooden toy that fits onto the front.
customer_reviews.author: ER RN

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. It is super easy to set up there is no batteries involved and it works wonders on my 9 month old she falls asleep in it and it really gives us a break to do other things I would recommend attaching the little toy to it I know its expensive but worth it really a great device and worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Talukder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This has been extremely useful for my grandson! We take it back and forth when he comes here to Grammy's house. He has reflux and needs to sit up for 15-20in after feeding and this allows perfect angle. And he loves bouncing in it. I got the toy attachment as well.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl McClellan

customer_reviews.title: One of my top 5 must-haves for my son
customer_reviews.text: I'll echo everyone else's comments. Yes its pricey but my son spends more time in this chair than any other toy and to me that justifies the cost. We thought he had acid reflux/gas so this bouncer was perfect to keep him upright, and to "kick" out his gas. It ended up being a soy intolerance that caused his gas but regardless he LOVES spending time in this chair and I would buy it again. My son initially liked the wooden toy at 2 months, but by 3 months it made him cross-eyed and mad so we no longer attach it to the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Lily B.

customer_reviews.title: A must!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a second (we have twins) I would die without it. My newborns love it and it stops them from crying. It’s not like the other bouncer we have. Do not hesitate worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Put this Bouncer on your Registry!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I chose the mesh variety of this seat. I take it out to the pool with us and after a dip in the pool I don't hesitate to put him in the seat if his trunks are wet because it dries so quickly. Being mesh it also keeps my baby from becoming overheated. I also love that it can lay totally flat which makes it easy it to pack into the car and take along. It's also lightweight which makes it easy to move it from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Zoeyzoes

customer_reviews.title: the best bouncer.
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer was amazing for my baby with reflux. most bouncer seats are more rounded, but the angle on this one was great for keeping her upright. So easy to clean, as the cover just slips off.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: If you have money to burn, this works
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously over priced for a baby seat, but yeah, ok. I bought this because, while under massive sleep deprivation mode, I thought I needed it for my 4 month old who didn't want to hang out on her backside. She used it for maybe a month, and now it something my toddler loves to try to sit in. Would I pay $220 all over again? Hell no. But does it work? Sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Tarzana

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the investment- it was the ONLY place our baby would fall asleep in (in addition to mommy's arms, and a car seat). Only drawback- you have to constantly rock it with your hand or a foot or it stops. It's fine if your baby doesn't mind not being rocked; ours would start crying unless rocked into a deep sleep
customer_reviews.author: Nick Frey

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son had another bouncer but he didn't seem to care for it. I purchased this after reading lots of reviews about kids preferring this one. He's only a little over 3 months but it's proven to be much better than the cheaper one we had. He will sit in this a lot longer. I DEFINITELY recommend purchasing the toy bar. He absolutely loved it. Definitely his favorite part. He was grabbing and spinning the toys on the bar right away!! Definitely makes him happier to sit in it a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Swain

customer_reviews.title: Our baby loves it and so do we
customer_reviews.text: One of the best baby bouncers, recommended by our Pediatrician friend. We were reluctant initially with concept of boucer for babies but this one no complaints and above all our baby has beautiful time sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Marwah

customer_reviews.title: Best bouncer
customer_reviews.text: The best bouncer. Seriously. It may seem very bland but it does what it needs to. It entertains my daughter. She is now able to bounce herself in it. It soothes her and keeps her busy.
customer_reviews.author: Qwerty

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bouncer! So light and a gorgeous modern look
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bouncer! So light and a gorgeous modern look. My baby loved it. I had to return it because my baby is very large in size and heavy so it was bending too much. But for an average sized baby this is great and definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Nadjari

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a real life-saver. Our twins love it and bounce in it all day long, getting exercise and learning motor skills as well as keeping them occupied. I am glad we bought this and not some automated bouncer. The fabric cover is easily removed and washes well. Not cheap but I don't mind paying for great design. Because it was expensive I only bought one but quickly had to buy another for our other child when I saw how well-received it was.
customer_reviews.author: Enkidu

customer_reviews.title: Will allow your baby to entertain her-/himself for a while!!
customer_reviews.text: All three of my children love(d) the Babybjörn bouncy chairs! When they are little, you can bounce the chair, when they are around four months they will start bouncing the chair by themselves by moving their legs! My babies kept themselves entertained in this chair, sometimes for surprisingly long times! The chairs were also a lifesaver with my twins. Sometimes twins get hungry at the same time while mommy is alone with them. And then what? I would sit mine in their bouncy chairs and feed them at the same time. I highly recommend the Babybjörn bouncy chair!!
customer_reviews.author: S LUGER-KLEIN

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bouncer. It is soft and comfortable. I can place the baby in it while I do stuff around the house and even when I shower. I live is two story home so I bring it everywhere in the house. I get many compliments on it too!! Worth the money as it will grow from newborn onwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: my baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this. Recommended by a mama friend and my baby loves this since day 2. Easy to wash if he pees on it, simple to bring to bbqs, sits in it while we ear dinner. It's pricy but we really love this item. I recommend to all my friends but due to it being expensive not all mama's can afford it. If you have a gift card or have a family member to buy you a nice gift put this on the list. You won't be disappointed. I would upload a pic or video of my babe in it if mobile site supported it
customer_reviews.author: Tp

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant! By some reason my child hated the previous ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! By some reason my child hated the previous bouncer - electric powered sci-fi looking unit with multiple modes and speeds and I had to get rid of it. Tried this one instead because of the ratings and feedback and it worked! pros: great quality, easy to remove and wash material, simple construction, it works. cons: a bit overpriced as for device that simple, it literally consists of one metal, two plastic and one cloth parts... Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Best bouncer in th market! We have 3! One for nursery, one for my office and one for downstairs! Baby loves to take naps and chill in it. Comfy and versatile. Long life spam. Cool design and light weight!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: i don't know what's so special about this chair but it works like magic! we've tried 4 different kinds and my ...
customer_reviews.text: my 2 months old baby loves this chair, in fact its the only chair he will sit in and not cry, i don't know what's so special about this chair but it works like magic! we've tried 4 different kinds and my son didn't like any of them thats the only one he likes. i highly recommend getting one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bouncer w/jersey knit is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought an open box jersey knit Bouncer Bliss. Glad we did. Our baby girl really likes it. It looks well made & worth the price
customer_reviews.author: matt cecil

product_meta.title: BabyBjörn Bouncer Balance Soft, Cotton/Jersey, Dark Gray/Gray (005084US)
product_meta.description:
Style:Cotton/Jersey| Color:Dark Gray/GrayBouncer Balance Soft is an ergonomic baby bouncer where your baby can play or rest beside you while you take a shower, prepare a meal or do other household tasks. Your baby’s own movements set the baby bouncer gently rocking, which is great fun for your baby. The fitted fabric seat is comfortable, and gives good support to your baby’s back, neck and head. You can use the baby bouncer for your child from birth up to the age of two. Bouncer Balance Soft is a beloved classic in a soft and modern design.

Bouncer (max 20 lbs/9 kg):
Always use the restraint system. Make sure that both buttons are locked. You can adjust between two positions. Stop using the product as a bouncer once your child can sit up without help.

Chair (max 29 lbs/13 kg):
Use as chair when your child can walk and sit on his or her own. In order to convert the product into a chair, all you have to do is turn the fabric around.

Transport Dimensions: 4.5 x 35 x 15.5 in/11 x 89 x 39 cm

Washing Instructions:
Machine wash warm (40°C). Wash separately. Use an eco-friendly, mild and bleach-free detergent. Do not tumble dry.

Tested and Safe:
All materials meet the criteria for OEKO-TEX Standard 100, Class 1 for baby products. This means that they are kind to your baby’s skin and safe to taste.
Bouncer Balance Soft complies with the US ASTM F2167 and the EN12790:2009 safety standard.

BRAND STORY
By BabyBjorn
feature_bullets: Ergonomic baby bouncer – proper head and back support
Fun and natural rocking that stimulates your baby’s development
From 8 lbs/21 in (3.5 kg/53 cm) to 29 lbs (13 kg) (approx. for newborns and toddlers up to the age of 2)
Three different height positions and one transport mode
The fabric seat is easy to remove and machine washable
Suitable for both rest and play

specifications.Additional product features: Features folds for easy transport and storage, seat pad, sounds and songs and multi-directional seat positions
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,534 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
